name: Leavin' Teramis
storyline: Nigel MacGibbons is a free-minded pilot who likes to party. One morning he awakes with a hangover and finds out that he is in a spaceship called Teramis which is full of bloodthirsty aliens. He must find his way to get out in order to save himself.
summary: A top down run and gun shooter for Atari ST and Amiga. The game consists of eight levels restricted by a time limit.
